mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_SCHEMA FROM information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA not in ('information_schema', 'mysql', 'sys', 'performance_schema')

SELECT CREATE_TIME createTime, UPDATE_TIME updateTime, TABLE_ROWS dataRows, TABLE_SCHEMA datasource, TABLE_NAME name, TABLE_COMMENT remark FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schemaName}
AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}

SELECT COLUMN_NAME name, CASE COLUMN_key WHEN 'PRI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isKey, CASE IS_NULLABLE WHEN 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isNullable, DATA_TYPE type, if(CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, 1, 0) isCharMaxLength, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH charMaxLength, COLUMN_COMMENT remark FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schemaName} AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
